 Awarded for

 Location 
 United Kingdom 
 Presented by

 Currently held by 
 Stuart Craig  and  Anna Pinnock  for  Fantastic Beasts and Where to Find Them  (2016) 
 Website

 This is a list of winners and nominees for the  BAFTA Award for Best Production Design  for each year. The  British Academy of Film and Television Arts  (BAFTA) is a British organisation that hosts annual awards shows for movies, television, children's movies and television, and interactive media.
